name: reserve_entity_by_id
description: Causes the <%=tile%> to become _reserved_ by a <%=entity%> with a specific **unique ID**.
An <%=entity%> reserving a <%=tile%> will stop it from being set to certain <%=tile_state%>s.

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.desc: The **unique ID** of the <%=entity%> that you want to mark as reserving this <%=tile%>.
